data.lyric:
[ti:Holy]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Chance the Rapper]
[al:Holy]

[00:00.00]Holy - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)/Chance the Rapper
[00:00.62]Lyrics by：Jorgen Odegard/Jon Bellion/Michael Pollack/Justin Bieber/Tommy Lee Brown/Chancelor Johnathon Bennett/Anthony M. Jones/Steven Franks
[00:01.25]Composed by：Jorgen Odegard/Jon Bellion/Michael Pollack/Justin Bieber/Tommy Lee Brown/Chancelor Johnathon Bennett/Anthony M. Jones/Steven Franks
[00:01.88]Justin Bieber：
[00:02.45]
[00:06.29]I hear a lot about sinners
[00:09.48]
[00:11.77]Don't think that I'll be a saint
[00:14.33]
[00:17.19]But I might go down to the river
[00:20.21]
[00:22.13]'Cause the way that the sky opens up when we touch
[00:24.82]Yeah it's making me say
[00:27.09]That the way you hold me hold me hold me hold me hold me
[00:30.84]
[00:32.85]Feels so holy holy holy holy holy on God
[00:39.06]
[00:39.72]Runnin' to the altar like a track star
[00:41.83]
[00:42.33]Can't wait another second
[00:43.68]'Cause the way you hold me hold me hold me hold me hold me
[00:47.24]Feels so holy
[00:49.18]
[00:50.50]I don't do well with the drama
[00:53.40]
[00:55.84]And no I can't stand it being fake
[00:58.45]
[00:59.11]No no no no no no no
[01:01.44]I don't believe in nirvana
[01:04.45]
[01:06.42]But the way that we love in the night gave me life
[01:08.84]Baby I can't explain
[01:11.19]That the way you hold me hold me hold me hold me hold me
[01:14.93]
[01:16.91]Feels so holy holy holy holy holy on God
[01:23.21]
[01:23.83]Runnin' to the altar like a track star
[01:25.87]
[01:26.44]Can't wait another second
[01:27.66]'Cause the way you hold me hold me hold me hold me hold me
[01:31.41]Feels so holy
[01:33.29]
[01:34.53]They say we're too young and
[01:36.31]
[01:36.82]The pimps and the players say "Don't go crushin'"
[01:39.56]Wise men say fools rush in but I don't know
[01:44.23]
[01:45.82]They say we're too young and
[01:47.34]
[01:47.89]The pimps and the players say "Don't go crushin'"
[01:50.70]Wise men say fools rush in but I don't know
[01:54.57]Chance the Rapper：
[01:55.06]Chance the Rapper
[01:55.96]
[01:56.53]The first step pleases the Father might be the hardest to take
[02:04.70]
[02:07.46]But when you come out of the water I'm a believer
[02:13.38]My heart is fleshy life is short with a temper like Joe Pesci
[02:17.14]They always come and sing your praises your name is catchy
[02:20.05]But they don't see you how I see you Parlay and Desi
[02:22.84]Cross Tween Tween Hesi' hit the jet speed
[02:25.53]When they get messy go lefty like Lionel Messi
[02:28.29]Let's take a trip and get the Vespas or rent a Jet Ski
[02:31.18]I know the spots that got the best w**d we goin' next week
[02:33.74]I wanna honor wanna honor you bride's groom I'm my father's child
[02:37.63]I know when the son takes the first steps the Father's proud
[02:40.83]If you make it to the water He'll part the clouds
[02:43.38]I know He made you a snack like Oscar Proud
[02:46.00]Suffer it to be so now gotta clean it up
[02:48.29]
[02:48.80]Formalize the union in communion He can trust
[02:51.18]I know I ain't leavin' you like I know He ain't leavin' us
[02:53.96]I know we believe in God and I know God believes in us
[02:56.41]Justin Bieber：
[02:56.74]'Cause the way you hold me hold me hold me hold me hold me
[02:59.90]
[03:01.73]Feels so holy holy holy holy holy on God
[03:08.76]Runnin' to the altar like a track star
[03:10.63]
[03:11.31]Can't wait another second on God
[03:13.59]
[03:14.25]Runnin' to the altar like a track star
[03:16.84]Can't wait another second on God
[03:19.16]
[03:19.70]Runnin' to the altar like a track star
[03:22.35]Can't wait another second
[03:23.63]'Cause the way you hold me hold me hold me hold me
[03:26.65]Feels so ho-ho-ho-holy
data.trans:
[ti:Holy]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Chance the Rapper]
[al:Holy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.62]//
[00:01.25]//
[00:01.88]//
[00:02.45]
[00:06.29]听闻过太多的罪孽深重
[00:09.48]
[00:11.77]我并不觉得我实属圣人
[00:14.33]
[00:17.19]或许我会依照圣经所言去河边虔诚祷告
[00:20.21]
[00:22.13]只因我们触摸彼此的那一刻 天空也仿佛豁然开朗了
[00:24.82]是啊 这让我不禁感叹
[00:27.09]你紧拥我入怀 拥我入怀 拥我入怀
[00:30.84]
[00:32.85]这感觉无比神圣 神圣 丝毫不容亵渎
[00:39.06]
[00:39.72]如运动健将般奔向圣坛
[00:41.83]
[00:42.33]早已迫不及待
[00:43.68]只因你拥我入怀 拥我入怀 拥我入怀
[00:47.24]这感觉无比神圣
[00:49.18]
[00:50.50]我不太擅长夸大其辞
[00:53.40]
[00:55.84]也绝不容许虚情假意
[00:58.45]
[00:59.11]//
[01:01.44]我也不相信所谓的涅槃重生
[01:04.45]
[01:06.42]但要承认我们的爱一夜之间所赋予我生命的意义
[01:08.84]宝贝 我难以言明
[01:11.19]你紧拥我入怀 拥我入怀 拥我入怀
[01:14.93]
[01:16.91]这感觉无比神圣 神圣 丝毫不容亵渎
[01:23.21]
[01:23.83]如运动健将般奔向圣坛
[01:25.87]
[01:26.44]早已迫不及待
[01:27.66]只因你拥我入怀 拥我入怀 拥我入怀
[01:31.41]这感觉无比神圣
[01:34.53]人们都说我们太过年轻
[01:36.31]
[01:36.82]花花公子们极力告诫 不要动真心
[01:39.56]智者则言只有傻瓜才会坠入情爱 而我真的不懂
[01:44.23]
[01:45.82]人们都说我们太过年轻
[01:47.34]
[01:47.89]花花公子们极力告诫 不要动真心
[01:50.70]智者则言只有傻瓜才会坠入情爱 而我真的不懂
[01:54.57]//
[01:55.06]//
[01:55.96]
[01:56.53]取悦上帝的那第一步 或许最难迈出
[02:04.70]
[02:07.46]但当你虔诚祷告后 我就会成为忠实信徒
[02:13.38]我并非铁石心肠 生命本就短暂 就像乔·佩西一样喜怒难料
[02:17.14]人们总是为你唱起赞歌 你的名字是那般讨喜悦耳
[02:20.05]但人们怎会用我对待Parlay和Desi的态度那样对你
[02:22.84]上帝保佑 少年时代 少年时代 我的事业一飞冲天
[02:25.53]若是迷失了方向 像利昂内尔·梅西一样自信踢出左脚
[02:28.29]我们去旅行吧 买一辆小摩托 或者租一辆水上摩托
[02:31.18]我知道哪些窝里藏着最好的货 我们下周就去那里尝尝
[02:33.74]我想要 我想要向你表达敬意 上帝 我是我父亲的孩子
[02:37.63]我知道只要鼓起勇气迈步 父神就会为我骄傲
[02:40.83]若你可以功成名就 上帝会为你将乌云拨开
[02:43.38]我知道祂让你像奥斯卡·普劳德一样迷人
[02:46.00]咽下所有苦难 所以现在先把一切整理干净
[02:48.29]
[02:48.80]彼此团结 这样祂就能放心信赖
[02:51.18]我知道我不会离开你 正如祂与我们同在
[02:53.96]我知道我们信仰上帝 上帝同样对我们深信不疑
[02:56.41]//
[02:56.74]因你紧拥我入怀 拥我入怀 拥我入怀
[02:59.90]
[03:01.73]这感觉无比神圣 神圣 丝毫不容亵渎
[03:08.76]如运动健将般奔向圣坛
[03:10.63]
[03:11.31]已等不及上帝明示
[03:13.59]
[03:14.25]如运动健将般奔向圣坛
[03:16.84]已等不及上帝明示
[03:19.16]
[03:19.70]如运动健将般奔向圣坛
[03:22.35]早已迫不及待
[03:23.63]只因你拥我入怀 拥我入怀 拥我入怀
[03:26.65]这感觉无比神圣
